AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Learner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME never left the womb which is the Nanobotic Mass of the Engi homeworld. Until adulthood Name was unaware of the concept of self but when HE finally formed HIS mind was filled with the knowledge of his people. However, NAME struggled to control his body and understand that other beings were individuals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Diplomat
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Ever adventurous NAME emerged from the Nanobotic Mass early but quickly found himself without any knowledge of the world HE just entered. Fortunately a couple of human diplomats took NAME as their son where they taught him their profession. NAME grew up as a symbol of human-Engi cooperation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mantis child slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was ripped from the Nanobotic Mass by a mantis slave trader. Since NAME hadn’t formed naturally HE was malformed and couldn’t work his function as a mechanic as well the Mantis liked. NAME did learn however, the Mantis ways of fighting and used this to sabotage a Mantis clash with the Federation. He enlisted for the Federation cadets immediately after.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As soon as NAME formed HE knew HIS calling as an engineer. HE entered the Mechanicus soon after and did not leave for ten years. During HIS time their HE built many wonders which found him at odds with the Mechanicus ultimanius. The role of a mechanica is to fix not build. HE was expelled after erecting an enormous intricate human phallus.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Feeler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME made a horrible discovery after HE formed, HE could feel. NAME kept this crime hidden as best HE could until HE joined an Engi effort to colonise a new planet. After witnessing the effect of the bioweapons used to suppress the local wildlife NAME broke down. Discovered NAME ran into the forest leaving only a trail of tears.
